scripts.test:local: npm run generate && npm run compile && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run generate && npm run compile && npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.generate: rimraf src/icons && TS_NODE_PROJECT=scripts/tsconfig.json node -r ts-node/register scripts/generate.ts --target=icon
scripts.postcompile: npm run clean && TS_NODE_PROJECT=scripts/tsconfig.json node -r ts-node/register scripts/generate.ts --target=entry

scripts.ci: npm run lint && npm run test && npm run test-bugs
scripts.coverage: npm run coverage-generator && npm run coverage-viewer
scripts.dev: npm run watch & npm run demos-web
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build-lib && npm run build && npm run dist

scripts.postversion: npm run build-src && npm publish  --tag snapshot

app.name: @gw/fc-view-manager
app.description: 应用运行时前端组件管理器

scripts.postversion: npm run build && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

app.name: @gw/interact-data-components
app.description: 交互定时相关处理组件包

scripts.postversion: npm run build && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

app.name: @gw/soam-xjlx-xny
app.description: 新疆立新新能源定制化包

app.name: @gw/soam-zhangjk-gdt
app.description: 张家口国电投定制化包

scripts.postversion: npm run build && git push --follow-tags && npm publish

app.name: antd
app.description: An enterprise-class UI design language and React components implementation
app.title: Ant Design

scripts.build: npm run compile && NODE_OPTIONS='--max-old-space-size=4096' npm run dist
scripts.clean: antd-tools run clean && rm -rf es lib coverage dist report.html
scripts.compile: npm run clean && antd-tools run compile
scripts.predeploy: antd-tools run clean && npm run site && cp CNAME _site && npm run site:test
scripts.deploy:china-mirror: git checkout gh-pages && git pull origin gh-pages && git push git@gitee.com:ant-design/ant-design.git gh-pages
scripts.lint: npm run tsc && npm run lint:script && npm run lint:demo && npm run lint:style && npm run lint:deps && npm run lint:md
scripts.lint-fix: npm run lint-fix:script && npm run lint-fix:demo && npm run lint-fix:style
scripts.pub: npm run version && antd-tools run pub
scripts.site: cross-env NODE_ICU_DATA=node_modules/full-icu ESBUILD=1 concurrently "bisheng build --ssr -c ./site/bisheng.config.js" "npm run color-less"
scripts.start: antd-tools run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "npm run color-less" "bisheng start -c ./site/bisheng.config.js"
scripts.test-image: npm run compile:less && docker-compose run tests
scripts.install-react-16: npm i --no-save react@16 react-dom@16 react-test-renderer@16 enzyme-adapter-react-16

app.name: axios
app.description: Promise based HTTP client for the browser and node.js

scripts.version: npm run build && git add -A dist && git add CHANGELOG.md bower.json package.json

app.author: Matt Zabriskie

app.name: echarts
app.description: Apache ECharts is a powerful, interactive charting and data visualization library for browser

scripts.release: npm run build:lib && npm run build:i18n && npm run build && npm run build:esm && npm run build:extension
scripts.lint:dist: echo 'It might take a while. Please wait ...' && npx jshint --config .jshintrc-dist dist/echarts.js

app.name: echarts-gl
app.description: Extension pack of ECharts providing 3D plots and globe visualization

scripts.build: node build/glsl2js.js && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode development --devtool source-map && node node_modules/webpack/bin/webpack.js --mode production
scripts.release: npm run prepublish && npm run build

scripts.prebuild: rimraf dist/ && rimraf build/ && mkdirp dist && mkdirp build
scripts.build: tsc --module commonjs && rollup -c rollup.config.ts && npm run build:create-reftest-list && npm run build:testrunner && npm run build:minify
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unittest && npm run karma

app.name: moment
app.description: Parse, validate, manipulate, and display dates
app.author: Iskren Ivov Chernev <iskren.chernev@gmail.com> (https://github.com/ichernev)

scripts.coveralls: nyc npm test && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls

app.name: react
app.description: React is a JavaScript library for building user interfaces.

app.name: react-dom
app.description: React package for working with the DOM.

scripts.demo: cd demo && webpack &&  sh generate-contents.sh && ../node_modules/.bin/webpack-dev-server --content-base dist/
